content: repeat around you will have 9 purl sts in between your cables r40-45 repeat round 5 r46 *p1 m1pw p7 m1pw p1 4/4 lc * repeat around you will have 11 purl sts in between your cables r47-52 repeat round 5 r53 *p11 4/4 lc * repeat around r54-55 repeat round 5 you can bind off now with your favorite stretchy bobble or continue below adding the estonian braid with an i-cord bobble or ribbed bobble r56 estonian braid remove your stitch marker sl the last st from your right needle to your left *k through the back loop of the 2nd st k the first st normally drop both loops off left needle sl last st on the right needle back to the left* repeat *to* until you reach the end of your round don t slip the last st back to your right needle you will use your crochet hook and sl it under the first estonian braid st you made from top to bottom behind the st with your hook grab the last st on your right needle and pull it through/behind the first braid st sl the st back to your right needle and place your bor marker move on to the edging option of your choice 4 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern option 1 i-cord edging r57-58 k all sts around i cord bind off cast on 4 st using the knitted cast on method *k3 st k2tog tbl sl the 4 st back to the left needle * repeat * to* around work bobble stitches and sew together to join option 2 rib edging r57-59 *k1 p1* repeat around bobble all stitches in pattern using a stretchy bind off hide all tails and block your hiver cowl hide all loose tails 5 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern blocking using your blocking method of choice block your cowl to these finished measurements neck 9 inches/23cm bobble edge 22 inches/56cm length 12 inches/30 5cm should you have any questions please send them to pattern help unrulystitch@gmail com feel free to use the hashtag #theunrulystitchmakes on instagram or facebook of your works in progress and finish pieces instagram https //www instagram com/unrulystitch ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/theunrulystitch this pattern is a copyright © of anne arundale of the unruly stitch hiver cowl created using this pattern may be sold in small quantities with written consent first given by anne arundale of the unruly stitch credit must be given to anne arundale of the unruly stitch pattern and photos can not be used for resale purposes distribution in part or in whole of this pattern is strictly forbidden please share your work with the hashtag #theunrulystitchmakes and #hivercowl 6 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch
